name: metustrel
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wrel(c2))
-| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
